SUMMARY: A satellite view shows smoke along the Gaza-Israel border on Oct. 7 in an image combining natural with shortwave-infrared highlights. The image came from a Copernicus Sentinel satellite run, by the EU space program. Gallo Images/Orbital Horizon/Copernicus Sentinel Data 2023/Getty Images

TITLE: 25 years later, a Georgia mother isn't giving up on finding her missing daughter
SUMMARY: Sky'Kemmia Pate was just 8 years old when she was last seen at her residence in Unadilla, Ga., on Sept. 4, 1998. Twenty-five years later, her family is still hopeful for her safe return as they continue the search efforts for her. National Center for Missing and Exploited Children

TITLE: More pandas will be coming to the U.S., China's president signals
SUMMARY: Giant panda Xiao Qi Ji plays at his enclosure at the Smithsonian National Zoo in Washington in September

TITLE: Disgusted by city's top prosecutor, a police officer refuses to testify
SUMMARY: This image provided by WTVQ and taken from video shows people sitting at a table at Rockcastle Middle School, an evacuation center in Mt. Vernon, Ky., on Wednesday. People were evacuated after a CSX train derailed near Livingston, a town of about 200 people in Rockcastle County. CSX says two of the 16 cars that derailed carried molten sulfur, which caught fire after the cars were breached

TITLE: Stache the Sealyham terrier wins the National Dog Show
SUMMARY: The 2023 National Dog Show Best in Show winner is a Sealyham terrier named Stache. Ahead of this win, Stache was the No. 2-ranked Terrier and No. 12-ranked All-Breed show dog in America. He has won 49 Best in Show prizes

TITLE: Cleanup, air monitoring underway at Kentucky train derailment site
SUMMARY: This image provided by WTVQ and taken from video shows people sitting at a table at Rockcastle Middle School, an evacuation center in Mt. Vernon, Ky., on Wednesday. People were evacuated after a CSX train derailed near Livingston, a town of about 200 people in Rockcastle County. CSX says two of the 16 cars that derailed carried molten sulfur, which caught fire after the cars were breached

TITLE: Why are sales so hard to resist? Let's unravel this Black Friday mystery
SUMMARY: If it's a Rolex you're after, you're in luck. There are almost always a few available at Unclaimed Baggage. In fact, the most expensive item ever sold here was a platinum Rolex that was appraised for $64,000 and sold for $32,000 in 2014

TITLE: A car-sized tumbleweed made quite a scene on a California highway
SUMMARY: A tumbleweed roughly the size of a car was captured on video this week and posted on X, where commenters compared it to a giant hairball, belly lint gone wild, and the critters from a 1986 sci-fi horror movie. @tuidelescribano/Screen shot by NPR

TITLE: Sean 'Diddy' Combs accused of sexual abuse by two more women

SUMMARY: The work attributed to Titian hangs between two other paintings of Saint Sebastian in the gallery of Belen Jesuit Preparatory School in Miami

TITLE: An atmospheric river is soaking the Pacific Northwest with record-breaking rain
SUMMARY: Bernie Crouse wades through water outside his home after the nearby South Fork Stillaguamish River crested early in the morning flooding several houses in this neighborhood, Dec. 5, 2023, in the Arlington area of Seattle, Washington

TITLE: Texas' illegal entry law will test states' powers on immigration, border enforcement
SUMMARY: Migrants cross the Rio Grande from Mexico near El Paso, Texas. A new law makes illegal entry into Texas from a foreign country a state crime. It also authorizes a state judge to order someone to return to Mexico after their arrest. Julian Aguilar/The Texas Newsroom

TITLE: Pilots say they're afraid to seek mental health care. The FAA says it's listening
SUMMARY: For decades, pilots have been reluctant to seek mental health care for fear of losing their licenses. At a safety forum Wednesday in Washington, pilots and safety experts urged federal regulators to reform rules that discourage pilots from getting treatment

TITLE: A Black Texas student has been suspended once again for his natural hairstyle
SUMMARY: Darryl George, 18, will spend the remainder of the year in in-school suspension, extending a punishment that was first imposed in August over his hairstyle that district officials maintain violates their dress code policy

SUMMARY: Law enforcement officers head into the University of Nevada, Las Vegas, campus after reports of an active shooter, Wednesday, Dec. 6, 2023, in Las Vegas

SUMMARY: A pending sale sign in Little Rock, Ark., in 2011. A new Redfin analysis finds the share of affordable homes for sale in 2023 was the lowest in at least a decade. Danny Johnston/AP file photo

TITLE: 2023 in photos: NPR station photographers share memorable moments
